content:
VerifyServerCertificateCallback Delegate

Definition

The VerifyServerCertificateCallback delegate gets or sets the default callback function used to verify server certificates when establishing an SSL connection.

In this Article

public delegate bool VerifyServerCertificateCallback(LdapConnection connection, X509Certificate certificate);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
VerifyServerCertificateCallback
